item.description:
Help out Project Smile by attending the People scavenger Hunt on Tuesday, May 18 from 6 - 9 pm at Splash.

All guests get over $150.00 in giveaways and a couple of winners get over $1000.00 in prizes.

The event is a social party complete with complimentary pool, hors d'oeuvres, and a fabulous roof deck. You get a list of questions and you must find the answers to them from other people at the event. Some of the questions are unique, creative, funny and also outrageous. At one of the last events, a women scrambled to find a man who would buy them a drink and men searched for a women that would sing and do the Macarena for them.

The cost is only $10.00 per person.

To purchase tickets go to www.bostoneventguide.com/events
item.name: People Scavenger Hunt
